nodes.text: Alliance Intelligence Reports is a 95-page paperback supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published by West End Games. It was written by Bill Smith and published June 1, 1995.
It was set two years after the Battle of Yavin.
Alliance Intelligence Reports is presented as a compendium of "datafiles" about non-Imperial threats to the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It is divided into the following chapters:
